message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm initially offering it at $1,350,000.  I think it's a fair price considering the value it will bring.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I am willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but my original offer reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. This is my final offer.
I've carefully considered your latest offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must stay within my budget. I am now willing to pay $1,150,000 for the product.
